title: Treating Transgender Children and Adolescents
abstract: 1. Introduction: The Treatment of Dysphoric/Gender Variant Children and Adolescents Jack Drescher and William Byne Part I: Clinical Approaches 2. Clinical Management of Dysphoria in Children and Adolescents: The Dutch Approach Annelou L. C. de Vries and Peggy T. Cohen-Kettenis 3. Psychological Evaluation and Medical Treatment of Transgender Youth in an Interdisciplinary Gender Management Service (GeMS) in a Major Pediatric Center Laura Edwards-Leeper and Norman P. Spack 4. From Identity Disorder to Identity Creativity: True Self Child Therapy Diane Ehrensaft 5. A Comprehensive Program for Children with Variant Behaviors and Identity Disorders Edgardo Menvielle 6. A Developmental, Biopsychosocial Model for the Treatment of Children with Identity Disorder Kenneth J. Zucker, Hayley Wood, Devita Singh, and Susan J. Bradley Part II: Responses 7. The Dynamic Development of Variability Anne Fausto-Sterling 8. Supporting Transgender Children: New Legal, Social, and Medical Approaches Shannon Price Minter 9. Thoughts on the Nature of Identity: How Disorders of Sex Development Inform Clinical Research about Identity Disorders William G. Reiner and D. Townsend Reiner 10. Apples to Committee Consensus: The Challenge of Identity Classification David C. Rettew 11. Listening to Children Imagining Gender: Observing the Inflation of an Idea David Schwartz 12. Commentary on the Treatment of Variant and Dysphoric Children and Adolescents: Common Themes and Ethical Reflections Edward Stein 13. Dysphoric/Gender Variant (GD/GV) Children and Adolescents: Summarizing What We Know and What We Have Yet to Learn Jack Drescher and William Byne

topics.display_name: Ethics and Legal Issues in Pediatric Healthcare
